contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox prison | prison_name=Oberon Correctional Centre | location=[[Oberon, New South Wales|Oberon]], [[New South Wales]] | status=Operational | classification=Minimum (male) | capacity=100<ref name=aic/> | opened= | closed= | managed_by=[[Corrective Services NSW]] | coordinates = {{coord|-33.929667|149.848667|type:landmark|display=inline,title}} }} '''Oberon Correctional Centre''', an Australian [[prison|minimum security prison]] for young male offenders, is located {{convert|40|km}} from [[Oberon, New South Wales|Oberon]], [[New South Wales]]. The centre is operated by [[Corrective Services NSW]] an [[government agency|agency]] of the [[New South Wales Department of Attorney General and Justice|Department of Attorney General and Justice]] of the [[Government of New South Wales]]. The centre detains [[sentence (law)|sentenced]] [[felony|felons]] under New South Wales and/or [[Commonwealth of Australia|Commonwealth]] legislation. The centre caters for one of the final stages of the Corrective Services Young Offenders Program, which attempts to separate younger inmates from older, hardened inmates, and prepares them for eventual release.<ref name=aic>{{cite web |url=http://www.aic.gov.au/criminal_justice_system/corrections/facilities/nsw.aspx#oberon |title=Oberon Correctional Centre |work=New South Wales correctional facilities |publisher=Australian Government: Australian Institute of Criminology |date=23 August 2011 |accessdate=4 May 2012 }}</ref> == References == {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.correctiveservices.nsw.gov.au/offender-management/correctional-centres/oberon Oberon Correctional Centre website] {{NewSouthWalesPrisons}} [[Category:Prisons in New South Wales]] {{Australia-prison-stub}}
